clauses.title: 1. Information We Collect
items: Personal Information: Name, email, phone number, and project details provided via forms or direct communication.
Usage Data: Basic analytics (e.g., pages visited, time on site).
Third-Party Tools: If you contact us via WhatsApp or social media, their platforms may collect additional data.

clauses.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: To respond to your inquiries and provide services.
To send invoices, proposals, and project updates.
To improve our website and services.
To comply with legal obligations.

clauses.title: 3. Sharing of Information
items: We do not sell or rent your personal data.
We may share information only with:
Service providers (e.g., hosting).
Legal authorities if required by law.

clauses.title: 4. Data Security
items: We implement reasonable safeguards to protect your data.
However, no online transmission or storage method is 100% secure.

clauses.title: 5. Data Retention
items: We keep your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined above.
Clients may request deletion of their data at any time.

clauses.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Request access to the data we hold about you.
Request correction or deletion of your personal information.
Opt-out of marketing communications.

clauses.title: 7. Third-Party Links
items: Our website may contain links to external sites (e.g., hosting providers, payment processors).
We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those third parties.

clauses.title: 8. Updates
items: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. The latest version will always be posted on our website.
